com.st.BlueSTSDK.Utils

Class LogFeatureActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompatApi23.RequestPermissionsRequestCodeValidator, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.support.v7.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v7.app.AppCompatCallback, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public abstract class LogFeatureActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
    Helper class for an activity that have to log the feature data, this code manage the permission required for store file on the disk and send the collected data by mail the activity will instantiate a menu item for start/stop the log activity

      • exportDataByMail

        public static void exportDataByMail(android.app.Activity a,
                                    java.lang.String folder,
                                    java.io.File[] logs,
                                    boolean forceClose)
        Show a dialog for ask to the used to send a mail with the logs
        Parameters:
        a - activity used for send the mail intent
        folder - folder where the log file are stored
        logs - log files to send as attached
        forceClose - close the activity when the dialog is dismiss
